about_the_game:
Welcome to SnowTunes Island! This island is home to a magical Snowman, who never melts as long as he listens to music. Not even summer can stop him! Things take a turn for the deadly when his CD collection is stolen- it's up to YOU to get them back!

SnowTunes Island is a musical platformer where the music doubles as your lifebar. Find pieces of songs scattered throughout the island, but don't let the enemies skip your CD! As a Snowman, you'll leave behind a trail of ice whenever you die- ice will help you move faster, jump higher, and speed through any parts of the level you've already visited.



Features:
-Travel through more than 10 levels across 6 different areas, each with their own environmental soundtrack!

-Use momentum to traverse stages with graceful & well timed jumps!

-Build your own Snowman using Snowflakes you find in levels!

-Aim for the fastest time on each level in the time attack mode!

-Enjoy the BIGGEST Rondovo Games soundtrack so far! Immerse yourself in a new musical world from the same composer of Space Crab 2, Notebook Jam, and Sleep Patrol Alpha!

Have fun on your trip to SnowTunes Island, where the Snowmen are alive and the music never stops!
